content.label: Love this game ..it's my favorite & I don't have many favorites but this one was sooooo beautifully done & love the music..hoping to see ALOT more of this...love love love this game & the puzzles are so subtle & peaceful..Thank You for such an ENJOYABLE  game..I will be playing this over & over bc it’s just peaceful relaxing

Amazing! This tells a story of a girl and generations of girls that take a rough path to growing up. In the second Monument Valley it continues the generation when the girl in Monument Valley (this one) has her daughter take her path.

To me it was a waste of $4. Sweet little game but the puzzles are way too easy. Once you get how it works, there is very little mystery. I was looking to engage my brain and that didnt happen. Gorgeous design, yes, but i dont want to pay for that.
I love this game, but I completed all the free levels within 24 hours. I have played this before so I kinda remembered the levels, but it still seemed easy.

This game would be great if there gameplay wasn’t forty five minutes long and the levels weren’t super easy. It looks fun but it costs way too much and is super short. Don’t buy.
The only good thing about this game is that’s there are some cool optical illusions.

this game is so good it genuinely ruined puzzle games for me lol. monument valley 2 was even better!! it’s a relaxing but challenging game and playing it makes all my stress melt away. as someone with anxiety, this game really helps with that. no many how many times i play i can never get sick of this game. maybe it’s because i have garbage memory...either way, i’d definitely recommend both this, the sequel, and extra 8 levels. they’re worth their value and more to me.

This is the best thing that has ever happened to my iPhone. Played both twice. Starting a 3rd. Highly recommend. Lots of imitation out there but this is the best. You won’t be disappointed. Ready for the next level. Monument valley III. Please.

This puzzle game is so unique and unexpected that playing it is an almost enchanting experience.
If you enjoy clever puzzles, you will love this game. If you also enjoy optical illusions, this game is a "must have". The discovery moments will have you gasping out loud with joy.
I've been playing puzzle games for almost 50 years. This is one of the most delightful puzzlers I've ever played.

title.label: Needs more time way too short

content.label: Still great

This game is nearly impossible to put down. I’ve played several times through, and each time I’m more stunned at the genius of it. The game play is both simple and mind bogglingly complex. Once you figure something it it seems like it should’ve been the most obvious choice. Beautiful game. Couldn’t possibly recommend more.
So intriguing, started playing it on flights, so sad I’ve played them all.

If you like puzzle games, relaxing games, or just aesthetically pleasing games, this one is for you! The sound design is also wonderful. The levels are not too difficult but kept me occupied for several hours. I’ve played through the game twice, and I’ve played both Ida’s Dream and all the way through the expansion pack.
I ❤️❤️💙💜💛❤️🤎🖤💚💝❤️🤍 it but you should make a nother one
I love the music it relaxes me

This is the first game I’ve played as an adult that was memorable. It has mind-bending graphics and thoughtful sound design, with progressively challenging puzzles. If you’re into gaming for competition, you probably won’t like it. But if you like games that change the way you think and view the world, give it a try. This was just what I needed to relax during the pandemic. Looking forward to playing more games from this studio — and re-learning geometry!
Love parts 1 and 2 plus the shores extra. When are you going to do a Monument Valley  #3 and 4??
please make another one
This game is so wonderful! I wonder why we actually can’t do this in real life.🤔

This is the best puzzle game in the world! The graphics are amazing and the puzzles are both easy and hard. I got through all the levels in like, an hour! You put a lot of effort into this game:) have a nice day!
I got monument valley 2 for free and loved it so much, I came back and purchased monument valley (1) and the Isa Dream add on. Keep up the great work as I’ll be looking for valley 3!!!
My iPad is not muted but the sound is not working. How can I fix this? I’ve checked the settings of the game but both sound and music is enabled yet not working.

First Of All, AMAZING GRAPHICS! I Love The Serenity Of The Music As Well, :3. Bit Of a Problem, Though. I Wish There Was More Explaining And Storyline, I’m Stuck On Level Five😔. Most Of The Time I’m Completely Lost And Just Go With The Flow, But Other Than That It’s Great So Far! Awesome Game, One Of The Best In It’s Genre🤗
By far the best most creative and awe inspiring game.  Each time I play I’m amazed at where this game takes me, I love it.  You will not be disappointed.
Title!

title.label: Great game, I had problems with it

content.label:
So I remembered playing this game a few years ago an enjoying it. I decided to download it again (on a different account, so I had to pay for it) I opened the game a played the first level, when I got to the 2nd one I closed the app for a second to respond to a text. When I opened the app it was frozen. I cleared the app and opened it again and it froze on the black screen that says “us two games”. I deleted the app and re downloaded it and it still froze on that screen when I opened the app. 

The only reason I gave the 2 stars is because I remember loving this game a few years ago. It’s a shame I can’t play it again.

The levels are amazing and even forgotten shores!
I hope you make monument valley 3 😉👍

title.label: The BEST games I have ever played!

content.label: I bought the pack including both the first and second game. The graphics are just soooooo beautifully executed! I wouldn’t be surprised if I went to a modern art museum and saw these graphics in it. The audio is also amazing! I could just stare at one picture and listen to the audio for the rest of my life! The storyline is just so precious and it really describes the concept of family, friendship and love. I really love these games and if there is a third one coming out, it needs to be Ida’s child who finds her/his own path. I really appreciate these games and I love to be able to have a bonding experience with my family when we play together.
I like the game is nice I’m happy my mom got the game for me :) not over priced takes up a lot of Storage:/
The nostalgia is real
Frank Underwood brought me here

This game is absolutely one of the best games I have ever played. The mind-boggling illusions give the levels more depth, the ancient spirits give it a story, the characters and artwork make you want to keep going to see what’s next, and even the small details have a great place! The rose, placed by the coffin, the bird reflection of Ida, the stunning music at the right times, the bird men, who stole the “Sacred Geometry”, and the one tiny detail in the first level with the totem. On a wall, we see the people of the valley creating their geometry. That one tiny detail shows that even the smallest of things can add for beautiful gameplay. Five star review, this is a must-play.
a short but beautiful puzzle game with stunning sound design that i have played more times than i can count.
Please create more of this game!  I love the challenge to the mind.  Great games.
I love this game! It is so calming and the graphics are amazing! It’s so smooth which is really nice! I have only had it for a couple months but it hasn’t glitched once!

This is like the best game! It’s really cool how looking at the levels from different angles can change the map. The design is so beautiful. The only problem is that the story isn’t really clear. But that could be just me. Other than that 10/10 would recommend
I loved monument 1 so the sequel should be good

title.label: Best puzzle game worth the price

content.label:
Look, a lot of people are mad that this game costs money. But guys, this game took months of work and can’t be put our for free. This game has amazing graphics and is challenging. Sure it costs extra to get forgotten shores, but they added a new free chapter called “Ida’s dream” you should get this beautiful game.
(I like it so much I got monument valley two and forgotten shores)
It’s very beautiful game.
I love it im sad it ended it has to be the best game I’v ever played ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

I first downloaded this app years ago based on a friend’s suggestion. I remember liking it but thinking it wasn’t very long. I recently remembered it and decided to download it again to replay it. Since it’s been a while it was a good replay and I didn’t remember most of the levels. The levels are beautiful and just the right amount of challenge. I have to agree with others that for the price it’s a pretty short game. I’m glad I got some more play out of it but it’s not something I’d be able to enjoy playing again immediately.

I just discovered that I can purchase 8 more levels called forgotten shores.  I am not sure why I never noticed that.  It was fun 
It was 1.99 you can purchase it separately if you go to monument valley in the App Store you should see forgotten shores.  You need to select that manually in the app to start that after you finish playing MV. 
Fun game. Like a puzzle 
Music is good too
The game was the same great art and concept, but there was not enough levels and the levels were not as hard as the first game.
It was really great and I enjoyed it as much as version 1, but...I finished it at one night... it was too easy.. wish it was harder.
this and moument valley 2 are the most amazing apps i have ever played NO COMPLANTS.

title.label: As a retired elementary teacher this is the best,

content.label: No violence, just logical thinking  !!
I’m so stunned that I’m speechless

title.label: So good you will die if you don’t play

content.label: I had this game once but never finished an in crossy road your character it had download on your bird character every time I died so I downloaded and I had so much fun I finished in 2 days and the game made my brain think and I loved it if you like puzzles and great store you should download today
It’s so beautiful to play through and I love that it has a story to it. Great job to everyone involved in this :D

title.label: Stunningly beautiful and challenging game, but bearable by all.

content.label:
I loved this game so much. It’s more than a game. It’s a story, it’s an animated film, it’s an emotional art piece, it’s a soundtrack. 

I’ve never written an app review and I don’t really know what else to say.....

This lovely game is absolutely worth the money, as is the 8 level add-on and Monument Valley 2.
